knob.name: PchLan
knob.description: Enable/Disable onboard NIC.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCH LAN Controller

knob.name: LanWakeFromDeepSx
knob.description: Wake from DeepSx by the assertion of LAN_WAKE# pin
knob.depex: Sif( GbeSupportByPch _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchLan _EQU_ 0 OR GbeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/LAN Wake From DeepSx

knob.name: PchWakeOnLan
knob.description: Enable/Disable integrated LAN to wake the system.
knob.depex: Sif( GbeSupportByPch _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchLan _EQU_ 0 OR GbeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/ Wake on LAN Enable

knob.name: SlpLanLowDc
knob.description: Enable/Disable SLP_LAN# Low on DC Power.
knob.depex: Sif( GbeSupportByPch _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchLan _EQU_ 0 OR GbeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/ SLP_LAN# Low on DC Power

knob.name: SlpS0WithGBESupport
knob.prompt: Disqualify GBE Disconnect And ModPhy PG
knob.description: Enable/Disable the Disqualify GBE Disconnect And ModPhy PG bits
knob.depex: Sif( GbeSupportByPch _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchLan _EQU_ 0 OR GbeAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Disqualify GBE Disconnect And ModPhy PG

knob.name: EfiNetworkSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable EFI Network support for onboard LAN or WiFi module.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/EFI Network

knob.name: SensorHubType
knob.description: Choose the Sensor Hub Type, ?None? will Suppress ?I2C Sensor Hub? Setup Option?,?I2C? Will Suppress ?ALS? Setup Option and ?USB? will Suppress Both I2C and ALS.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Sensor Hub Type

knob.name: DeepSxMode
knob.description: configure the DeepSx Mode configuration.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/DeepSx Power Policies

knob.name: PsOnEnable
knob.description: Enable or disable PS_ON ()support a new C10 state from the CPU on desktop SKUs that enables a lower power target that will be required by the California Energy Commission (CEC).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PS_ON Enable

knob.name: PchWakeOnWlan
knob.prompt: Wake on WLAN and BT Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCI Express Wireless LAN and Bluetooth to wake the system.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Wake on WLAN and BT Enable

knob.name: PchWakeOnWlanDeepSx
knob.prompt: DeepSx Wake on WLAN and BT Enable
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCI Express Wireless LAN and Bluetooth to wake the system from DeepSx.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/DeepSx Wake on WLAN and BT Enable

knob.name: DisableDsxAcPresentPulldown
knob.description: Disable PCH internal ACPRESENT PullDown when DeepSx or G3 exit.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Disable DSX ACPRESENT PullDown

knob.name: PxeRom
knob.description: Enable/Disable PXE Option ROM execution.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PXE ROM

knob.name: PchLpcClockRun
knob.description: Enable the CLKRUN# logic to stop the PCI clocks.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/CLKRUN# logic

knob.name: PchSirqMode
knob.description: Configure Serial IRQ Mode.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Serial IRQ Mode

knob.name: StateAfterG3
knob.description: Specify what state to go to when power is re-applied after a power failure (G3 state).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/State After G3

knob.name: IchPort80Route
knob.description: Control where the Port 80h cycles are sent.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Port 80h Redirection

knob.name: EnhancePort8xhDecoding
knob.description: Support the word/dword decoding of port 80h behind LPC
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Enhance Port 80h LPC Decoding

knob.name: PchCrid
knob.description: Enable/Disable the PCH Compatible Revision ID feature
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Compatible Revision ID

knob.name: PchLegacyIoLowLatency
knob.description: Set to enable low latency of legacy IO. Some systems require lower IO latency irrespective of power. This is a tradeoff between power and IO latency.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Legacy IO Low Latency

knob.name: PchCrossThrottling
knob.description: Enable/Disable the PCH Cross Throttling feature. Only ULT support this feature.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCH Cross Throttling

knob.name: PchEnergyReport
knob.description: Enable Energy Report. MUST set it as ENABLED. This is only for test purpose.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCH Energy Reporting

knob.name: TestPchPmErDebugMode
knob.description: Energy Reporting Debug Mode
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Energy Reporting Debug Mode

knob.name: EnableTcoTimer
knob.description: Enable/Disable TCO timer. When disabled, it disables PCH ACPI timer, stops TCO timer, and ACPI WDAT table will not be published.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Enable TCO Timer

knob.name: PciePllSsc
knob.description: Pcie Pll SSC percentage.AUTO - Keep hw default, no BIOS override. Range is 0.0%-2.0%.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Pcie Pll SSC

knob.name: PchIoApic24119Entries
knob.description: Enables/Disables IOAPIC 24-119 Entries. IRQ24-119 may be used by PCH devices. Disabling those interrupts may cause certain devices failure.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/IOAPIC 24-119 Entries

knob.name: Enable8254ClockGating
knob.description: Enables/Disables 8254 clock gate in early phase. Set 8254CGE is necessary for SLP_S0 support. Platform is albe to disable this policy and set 8254CGE in late phase.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Enable 8254 Clock Gate

option.text: Enabled In Runtime and S3 Resume

knob.name: PchSidebandLock
knob.description: Lock PCH Sideband access, include SideBand PortID mask for certain end point (e.g. PSFx). The option is invalid if POSTBOOT SAI is set.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Lock PCH Sideband Access

knob.name: FprrEnable
knob.description: Enable Flash Protection Range Registers
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Flash Protection Range Registers (FPRR)

knob.name: SmbusSpdWriteDisable
knob.description: Enable/Disable setting SPD Write Disable. For security recommendations, SPD write disable bit must be set.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SPD Write Disable

knob.name: PchEspiLgmrEnable
knob.description: 64KB memory block for LGMR (LPC Memory Range Decode)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/LGMR

knob.name: TetonGlacierMode
knob.description: Select Teton Glacier Mode
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Teton Glacier Mode

option.text: Dynamic Configuration for Teton Glacier Enable

knob.name: RstDriverSelect
knob.description: Force locked/unlocked RST Pre-OS Driver to load
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/RST Driver Select

knob.name: PcieClockGatingDisabled
knob.description: PCI Express Clock Gating Enable/Disable for each root port.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Clock Gating

knob.name: PchDmiAspm
knob.description: The control of Active State Power Management of the DMI Link.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/DMI Link ASPM Control

knob.name: PchDelayEnDmiAspm
knob.description: Enable DMI ASPM after booting to OS.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/Delay Enable DMI ASPM

knob.name: PcieRootPort8xhDecode
knob.description: PCI Express Port8xh Decode Enable/Disable.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/Port8xh Decode

knob.name: Pcie8xhDecodePortIndex
knob.description: Select PCI Express Port8xh Decode Root Port. User to ensure port availability
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/ Port8xh Decode Port#

knob.name: PcieRootPortPeerMemoryWriteEnable
knob.description: Peer Memory Write Enable/Disable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/Peer Memory Write Enable

knob.name: PcieComplianceTestMode
knob.description: Enable when using Compliance Load Board
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/Compliance Test Mode

knob.name: PcieUsbGlitchWa
knob.description: PCIe-USB Glitch W/A for bad USB device(s) connected behind PCIE/PEG Port.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCIe-USB Glitch W/A

knob.name: RpFunctionSwap
knob.description: When Disabled, prevents PCIE rootport function swap. If any function other than 0th is enabled, 0th will become visible.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCIe function swap

knob.name: PcieImrEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable PCIe IMR
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/IMR Configuration/PCIe IMR

knob.name: PcieImrSize
knob.description: PCIe Reserved Memory Size to be requested in MB. Maximum value of 1024 MB
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/IMR Configuration/PCIe IMR Size

knob.name: Nvar4_ImrRpSelection
knob.description: Selects which root port will be associated with IMR
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/IMR Configuration/RP index for IMR

knob.name: EnableComplianceMode
knob.description: Option to enable Compliance Mode. Default is to disable Compliance Mode. Change to enabled for Compliance Mode testing.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/XHCI Compliance Mode

knob.name: PchXdciSupport

knob.name: PchUsb2SusWellPgEnable
knob.prompt: USB2 PHY Sus Well Power Gating

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/USB2 PHY Sus Well Power Gating

knob.name: PchUsbOverCurrentEnable
knob.description: Select ?Disabled? for pin-based debug. If pin-based debug is enabled but USB overcurrent is not disabled, USB DbC does not work.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/USB Overcurrent

knob.name: PchXhciOcLock
knob.description: Select ?Enabled? if Overcurrent functionality is used. Enabling this will make xHCI controller consume the Overcurrent mapping data
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/USB Overcurrent Lock

knob.name: UsbModifyOsc
knob.description: Modifies _OSC method of PCI0 device in ACPI tables. Normal - don?t do anything; wrong - break _OSC method so that it returns error when called.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/USB Test Options/Modify _OSC method

knob.name: UsbModifyPldUpc
knob.description: Modifies _PLD/_UPC objects of USB devices in ACPI tables. Normal - don?t do anything; Invisible - set Visible to 0; NotConnected - set Connectable to 0.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/USB Configuration/USB Test Options/Modify _PLD/_UPC objects

knob.name: PchSata
knob.description: Enable/Disable SATA Device.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/SATA Controller(s)

knob.name: SataInterfaceMode
knob.description: Determines how SATA controller(s) operate.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/SATA Mode Selection

option.text: Intel RST Premium With Intel Optane System Acceleration

knob.name: SataRstInterrupt
knob.description: Select which interrupt will be available to OS. This option only takes effect if SATA controller is in RAID mode
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/Sata Interrupt Selection

knob.name: TestRstPcieStorageRemapPortConfigCheck
knob.description: Port config check is a hardware mechanism for checking if remapping has been configured correctly, disabling it allows for x1 remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ FirmwareConfiguration _EQU_ 0 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/Storage Remapping Config Check

knob.name: RstPcieRemapEnabled_0
knob.description: Enable/Disable RST Pcie Storage Remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_0 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_0 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_1 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_2 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_3 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 1

knob.name: RstPcieRemapEnabled_1
knob.description: Enable/Disable RST Pcie Storage Remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_0 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_1 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_0 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_2 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_3 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_1 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 2

knob.name: RstPcieRemapEnabled_2
knob.description: Enable/Disable RST Pcie Storage Remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_0 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_2 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_0 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_1 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_3 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 3

knob.name: RstPcieRemapEnabled_3
knob.description: Enable/Disable RST Pcie Storage Remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_0 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_0 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_1 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_2 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_3 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 4

knob.name: RstPcieRemapEnabled_4
knob.description: Enable/Disable RST Pcie Storage Remapping
knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_1 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_4 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_5 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_6 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_7 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_4 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 5

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 6

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 7

knob.depex: Sif( PchSata _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( SataInterfaceMode _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( CycleRouterMap_1 _EQU_ 99 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieStorageMap_7 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( RstPcieRemapEnabled_4 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_5 _EQU_ 1 OR RstPcieRemapEnabled_6 _EQU_ 1 OR PcieStorageProgrammingInterface_7 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SATA And RST Configuration/PCIe Storage Dev On Port 8

knob.depex: Sif( PciePortCfg_23 _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieRootPortEn_23 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieLtrEnable_23 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieSnoopLatencyOverrideMode_23 _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/ Snoop Latency Multiplier

knob.name: PchPcieNonSnoopLatencyOverrideMode_23
knob.description: Non Snoop Latency Override for PCH PCIE. Disabled: Disable override. Manual: Manually enter override values. Auto (default): Maintain default BIOS flow.
knob.depex: Sif( PciePortCfg_23 _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieRootPortEn_23 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieLtrEnable_23 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/ Non Snoop Latency Override

knob.name: PchPcieNonSnoopLatencyOverrideValue_23
knob.description: LTR Non Snoop Latency value of PCH PCIE
knob.depex: Sif( PciePortCfg_23 _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieRootPortEn_23 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieLtrEnable_23 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieNonSnoopLatencyOverrideMode_23 _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/ Non Snoop Latency Value

knob.name: PchPcieNonSnoopLatencyOverrideMultiplier_23
knob.description: LTR Non Snoop Latency Multiplier of PCH PCIE
knob.depex: Sif( PciePortCfg_23 _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieRootPortEn_23 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieLtrEnable_23 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieNonSnoopLatencyOverrideMode_23 _NEQ_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/ Non Snoop Latency Multiplier

knob.name: PchPcieForceLtrOverride_23
knob.description: Force LTR Override for PCH PCIE. Disabled: LTR override values will not be forced. Enable: LTR override values will be forced and LTR messages from the device will be ignored.
knob.depex: Sif( PciePortCfg_23 _NEQ_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( PcieRootPortEn_23 _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchPcieLtrEnable_23 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/ Force LTR Override

knob.name: PchPcieLtrConfigLock_23
knob.description: PCIE LTR Configuration Lock
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/LTR Lock

knob.name: PchPcieDmiL1Edm_23
knob.prompt: Root port Enable/Disable Dmi L1 Entry Disable Mask
knob.description: This option enables or disables dmi l1 entry disable mask
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/PCI Express Configuration/PCI Express Root Port 24/Root port Enable/Disable Dmi L1 Entry Disable Mask

knob.name: PchHdAudio
knob.description: Control Detection of the HD-Audio device. Disabled - HDA will be unconditionally disabled Enabled - HDA will be unconditionally enabled.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio

knob.name: PchHdAudioDsp
knob.description: Enable/Disable Audio DSP.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ Audio DSP

knob.name: PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance
knob.description: Specifies DSP enabled system compliance: 1. Non-UAA (IntelSST driver support only - CC_040100) 2. UAA (HD Audio Inbox or IntelSST driver support - CC_040380) Note: NHLT (DMIC/BT/I2S configuration) is published for non-UAA only.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ Audio DSP Compliance Mode

knob.name: PchHdAudioLinkMode
knob.description: Selects link mode: Intel HD Audio link, SSP (I2S) or SoundWire. Interfaces enabled: 1) HDA: HDA-Link[SDI0-1], DMIC[0-1] 2) I2S: SSP[0-2], DMIC[0-1] 3) SNDW: SNDW[1-4] 4) Advanced: Allows to enable each interface separately. Note: DMIC link is required to publish DMIC endpoint configuration in NHLT. SSP link is required to publish I2S/BT endpoint configuration in NHLT.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ Audio Link Mode

knob.name: PchHdAudioLinkConfig_0
knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_3 _EQU_ 1 OR PchHdAudioLinkConfig_9 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_0 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ HDA Link

knob.name: PchHdAudioLinkConfig_1
knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_12 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_1 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ DMIC #0

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_11 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_2 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ DMIC #1

knob.name: PchHdAudioLinkConfig_3
knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_3 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #0

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_10 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_4 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #1

knob.name: PchHdAudioLinkConfig_5
knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_5 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchCnviPresent _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #2

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #3

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #4

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_8 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SSP #5

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_0 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_9 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SNDW #1

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_4 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_10 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SNDW #2

knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_2 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_11 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SNDW #3

knob.description: Muxed interfaces: 1) HDA/SSP0 2) HDA[SDI1]/SSP1 3) DMIC0/SNDW4 4) DMIC1/SNDW3 CNL only: 5) HDA/SNDW1 6) SSP1/SNDW2
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 3 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_1 _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( AudioLinkSupported_12 _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ SNDW #4

knob.name: PchHdAudioCodecSelect
knob.description: Selects whether Platform Onboard Codec (single Verb Table installed) or External Codec Kit (multiple Verb Tables installed) will be used.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/ HDA-Link Codec Select

knob.name: PchHdaIDisplayCodecDisconnect
knob.description: Disconnects SDI2 signal to hide/disable iDisplay Audio Codec.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/iDisplay Audio Disconnect

knob.name: PchHdAudioCodecSxWakeCapability
knob.description: Capability to detect wake initiated by a codec in Sx (eg by modem codec)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/Codec Sx Wake Capability

knob.name: PchHdAudioPme
knob.description: Enables PME wake of HD Audio controller during POST.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/PME Enable

knob.name: PchHdAudioSndwBufferRcomp
knob.description: GPIO buffer RCOMP adjustment for Soundwire Clock interfaces. 1. non-ACT - 50 Ohm driver impedance when bus topology does not have the external AC termination. 2. ACT - 8 Ohm driver impedance when bus topology has the external AC termination.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( ( PchHdAudioLinkMode _NEQ_ 2 OR ( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 3 AND ( PchHdAudioLinkConfig_9 _EQU_ 1 OR PchHdAudioLinkConfig_10 _EQU_ 1 ) ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/SoundWire Buffer RCOMP Setting

knob.name: PchHdaHdAudioLinkFreq
knob.description: Selects HD Audio Link frequency. Applicable only if HDA codec supports selected frequency.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/ HD Audio Link Frequency

knob.name: PchHdaIDisplayLinkFreq
knob.description: Selects iDisplay Link frequency.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/ iDisplay Audio Link Frequency

knob.name: PchHdaIDisplayLinkTmode
knob.description: Indicates whether SDI is operating in 1T, 2T (CNL).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio Advanced Configuration/ iDisplay Audio Link T-Mode

knob.name: PchHdAudioNhltEndpointDmic
knob.description: Selects DMIC to expose in NHLT ACPI table
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance _NEQ_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 2 OR ( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 3 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_1 _EQU_ 0 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_2 _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ DMIC

knob.name: PchHdAudioNhltEndpointBluetooth
knob.description: Enables/Disables Bluetooth Endpoint in NHLT ACPI table
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance _NEQ_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 0 OR PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 2 OR ( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 3 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_3 _EQU_ 0 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_4 _EQU_ 0 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_5 _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ Bluetooth

knob.name: PchHdAudioNhltEndpointI2s
knob.description: Enables/Disables I2S Endpoint in NHLT ACPI table.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance _NEQ_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 0 OR PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 2 OR ( PchHdAudioLinkMode _EQU_ 3 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_3 _EQU_ 0 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_4 _EQU_ 0 AND PchHdAudioLinkConfig_5 _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ I2S

knob.name: PchHdAudioI2sCodecSelect
knob.description: Selects I2S Audio Codec. Note regarding JD pin muxing: -[CNL/CFL U/Y] SerialIo UART0 -[CFL S] SATA DevSlp must be disabled to enable external I2S codec.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance _NEQ_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioNhltEndpointI2s _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ I2S Codec Select

knob.name: PchHdAudioNhltDefaultFlow
knob.description: If set to zero new flow is enabled in other cases default flow.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Gif( PchHdAudioDspUaaCompliance _NEQ_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ NHLT Default Flow

knob.name: PchHdAudioFeature_0
knob.description: Enables/Disables DSP Feature. Bitmask structure: [BIT0] - WoV [BIT1] - BT Sideband [BIT2] - Codec based VAD [BIT5] - BT Intel HFP [BIT6] - BT Intel A2DP [BIT7] - DSP based speech pre-processing disabled (for Intel WoV mode) [BIT8] - WoV Mode: Intel WoV / Windows Voice Activation for Cortana
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x4 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudio _EQU_ 0x0 ) _AND_ Sif( PchHdAudioDsp _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/HD Audio Configuration/HD Audio DSP Features Configuration/ WoV (Wake on Voice)

knob.name: PchRtcMemoryLock
knob.description: Enable will lock bytes 38h-3Fh in the lower/upper 128-byte bank of RTC RAM
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Security Configuration/RTC Memory Lock

knob.name: PchBiosLock
knob.description: Enable/Disable the PCH BIOS Lock Enable feature. Required to be enabled to ensure SMM protection of flash.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Security Configuration/BIOS Lock

knob.name: UnlockGpioPads
knob.prompt: Force unlock on all GPIO pads
knob.description: If Enabled BIOS will force all GPIO pads to be in unlocked state
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/Security Configuration/Force unlock on all GPIO pads

knob.name: PchSerialIoDevice_0
knob.description: Enables/Disables SerialIo Controller If given device is Function 0 PSF disabling is skipped. PSF default will remain and device PCI CFG Space will still be visible. This is needed to allow PCI enumerator access functions above 0 in a multifunction device. The following devices depend on each other: I2C0 and I2C1,2,3 UART0 and UART1,SPI0,1 UART2 and I2C4,5 UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be disabled when: 1. Child device is enabled like CNVi Bluetooth (\_SB.PCI0.UA00.BTH0) UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be enabled when: 1. I2S Audio codec is enabled (\_SB.PCI0.I2C0.HDAC)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/I2C0 Controller

knob.description: Enables/Disables SerialIo Controller If given device is Function 0 PSF disabling is skipped. PSF default will remain and device PCI CFG Space will still be visible. This is needed to allow PCI enumerator access functions above 0 in a multifunction device. The following devices depend on each other: I2C0 and I2C1,2,3 UART0 and UART1,SPI0,1 UART2 and I2C4,5 UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be disabled when: 1. Child device is enabled like CNVi Bluetooth (\_SB.PCI0.UA00.BTH0) UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be enabled when: 1. I2S Audio codec is enabled (\_SB.PCI0.I2C0.HDAC)
knob.depex: Gif( ( PlatformType _EQU_ 0x2 AND ( _LIST_ PchHdAudioI2sCodecSelect _EQU_ 1 2 3 ) ) OR ( PchCnviMode _EQU_ 1 AND TestCnviBtUartType _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/UART0 Controller

knob.name: PchSerialIoDevice_10
knob.description: Enables/Disables SerialIo Controller If given device is Function 0 PSF disabling is skipped. PSF default will remain and device PCI CFG Space will still be visible. This is needed to allow PCI enumerator access functions above 0 in a multifunction device. The following devices depend on each other: I2C0 and I2C1,2,3 UART0 and UART1,SPI0,1 UART2 and I2C4,5 UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be disabled when: 1. Child device is enabled like CNVi Bluetooth (\_SB.PCI0.UA00.BTH0) UART 0 (00:30:00) cannot be enabled when: 1. I2S Audio codec is enabled (\_SB.PCI0.I2C0.HDAC)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/UART1 Controller

knob.name: PchSerialIoDevice_11
knob.description: Enables/Disables SerialIo Controller For this device to work I2C4 has to be enabled
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/UART2 Controller

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPadType
knob.description: Indicates what type of I2C Touch Pad is connected to this SerialIo controller
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Pad Settings/Touch Pad

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPadIrqMode
knob.description: Selects different routing for interrupts from Touch Pad
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 1 3 5 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPadType _EQU_ 0 OR ( PchI2cSensorDevicePort_0 _EQU_ 0x1 AND ( PchI2cTouchPadType _EQU_ 3 OR PchI2cTouchPadType _EQU_ 4 ) ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Pad Settings/Touch Pad Interrupt Mode

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPadBusAddress
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 1 3 5 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPadType _NEQ_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Pad Settings/Device?s bus address

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPadHidAddress
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 1 3 5 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPadType _NEQ_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Pad Settings/Device?s HID address

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPadSpeed
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 1 3 5 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPadType _NEQ_ 5 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Pad Settings/Device?s bus speed

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPanelType
knob.description: Indicates what type of I2C Touch Panel is connected to this SerialIo controller
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Panel Settings/Touch Panel

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPanelIrqMode
knob.description: Selects different routing for interrupts from Touch Panel
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 2 3 6 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPanelType _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Panel Settings/Touch Panel Interrupt Mode

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPanelBusAddress
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 2 3 6 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPanelType _NEQ_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Panel Settings/Device?s bus address

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPanelHidAddress
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 2 3 6 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPanelType _NEQ_ 7 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Panel Settings/Device?s HID address

knob.name: PchI2cTouchPanelSpeed
knob.description: Specify parameters of custom I2C device
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_3 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchI2cSensorDevicePort_3 _NEQ_ 2 3 6 7 ) _AND_ Sif( PchI2cTouchPanelType _LT_ 6 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO I2C3 Settings/Serial IO Touch Panel Settings/Device?s bus speed

knob.name: PchSpiFingerPrintType

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO SPI2 Settings/Serial IO Finger Print Settings/Finger Print Sensor

knob.name: PchSpiSensorIrqMode

knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_8 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchSpiSensorDevicePort_8 _NEQ_ 0x1 ) _AND_ Sif( PchSpiFingerPrintType _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO SPI2 Settings/Serial IO Finger Print Settings/Finger Print Interrupt Mode

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO SPI2 Settings/Serial IO Finger Print Settings/D0-?D3 idle timeout (screen on)

knob.name: PchSerialIoTimingM0C8
knob.description: Default: 200 [DEC] Minimum: 1 [DEC] Maximum: 10000 [DEC]
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_8 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchSpiSensorDevicePort_8 _NEQ_ 0x1 ) _AND_ Sif( PchSerialIoUseTimingParameters _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO SPI2 Settings/Serial IO Finger Print Settings/D0-?D3 idle timeout (screen off)

knob.name: PchSerialIoTimingM1C8
knob.description: Default: 2000 [DEC] Minimum: 1 [DEC] Maximum: 10000 [DEC]
knob.depex: Sif( PchSerialIoDevice_8 _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( _LIST_ PchSpiSensorDevicePort_8 _NEQ_ 0x1 ) _AND_ Sif( PchSerialIoUseTimingParameters _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-IO Configuration/SerialIo Configuration/Serial IO SPI2 Settings/Serial IO Finger Print Settings/D0-?D3 idle timeout (screen on)

knob.name: MeStateControl
knob.description: When Disabled ME will be put into ME Temporarily Disabled Mode.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME State

knob.name: MngState
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) Manageability features. NOTE: This option disables/enables Manageability Features support in FW. To disable support platform must be in an unprovisioned state first.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( AfterEoP _EQU_ 0x1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Manageability Features State

knob.name: Amt
knob.description: When disabled AMT BIOS Features are no longer supported and user is no longer able to access MEBx Setup. Note: This option does not disable Manageability Features in FW.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( AfterEoP _EQU_ 0x1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT BIOS Features

knob.name: MeUnconfigOnRtcClear
knob.description: When Disabled ME will not be unconfigured on RTC Clear
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Unconfig on RTC Clear

knob.name: CommsHubEnable
knob.description: Enables/Disables support for Comms Hub.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Comms Hub Support

knob.name: MeJhiSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel(R) DAL Host Interface Service (JHI)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/JHI Support

knob.name: CoreBiosDoneEnabled
knob.description: Enable/Disable Core Bios Done message sent to ME
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Core Bios Done Message

knob.name: TpmDeactivate
knob.description: Enabling this option will invoke the TPM 1.2 De-activate flow
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( AfterEoP _EQU_ 0x1 ) _AND_ Sif( BootGuardSupport _EQU_ 0 OR dTpm12Present _EQU_ 0 OR MeasureBoot _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/PTT Configuration/TPM 1.2 Deactivate

knob.name: MeFwDowngrade
knob.description: Enable/Disable Me FW Image Re-Flash function.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Firmware Update Configuration/Me FW Image Re-Flash

knob.name: LocalFwUpdEnabled
knob.description: Options for Local FW Update function.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x03 ) _AND_ Gif( AfterEoP _EQU_ 0x1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Firmware Update Configuration/Local FW Update

knob.name: EyeRiverOverrideProt
knob.description: Sends Unset All SW Sticky Arming Indications Pre EoP and Eye River Override Pre EoP Heci Messages to Eye River Client
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 ) _AND_ Gif( EyeRiverAvailable _EQU_ 0x0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Eye River Configuration/Override Protection

knob.name: HeciTimeouts
knob.description: Enable/Disable HECI Send/Receive Timeouts.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/HECI Timeouts

knob.name: DidInitStat
knob.description: Forces the DID Initialization Status value.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/Force ME DID Init Status

knob.name: DisableCpuReplacedPolling
knob.description: Setting this option disables CPU replacement polling loop
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/CPU Replaced Polling Disable

knob.name: SendDidMsg
knob.description: Enable/Disable ME DID Message (disable will prevent the DID message from being sent).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/ME DID Message

knob.name: DisableHeciRetry
knob.description: Setting this option disables retry mechanism for all HECI APIs
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/HECI Retry Disable

knob.name: DisableMessageCheck
knob.description: Setting this option disables message check for Bios Boot Path when sending
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/HECI Message check Disable

knob.name: SkipMbpHob
knob.description: Setting this option will skip MBP HOB
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/MBP HOB Skip

knob.name: HeciCommunication2
knob.description: Adds and Removes HECI2 Device from PCI space.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/HECI2 Interface Communication

knob.name: KtDeviceEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable KT Device
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/KT Device

knob.name: EndOfPostMessage
knob.description: Enable/Disable End of Post message sent to ME
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/End Of Post Message

knob.name: DisableD0I3SettingForHeci
knob.description: Setting this option disables setting D0I3 bit for all HECI devices
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/D0I3 Setting for HECI Disable

knob.name: MctpBroadcastCycle
knob.description: Enable/Disable Management Component Transport Protocol Broadcast Cycle and Set PMT as Bus Owner
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/ME Debug Configuration/MCTP Broadcast Cycle

knob.name: AutoArbSvnCommit
knob.description: When enabled, hardware-enforced Anti-Rollback mechanism is automatically activated: once ME FW was successfully run on a platform, FW with lower ARB-SVN will be blocked from execution
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Anti-Rollback SVN Configuration/Automatic HW-Enforced Anti-Rollback SVN

knob.name: InvokeArbSvnCommit
knob.prompt: Set HW-Enforced Anti-Rollback for Current SVN
knob.description: Enable hardware-enforced Anti-Rollback mechanism for current ARB-SVN value. FW with lower ARB-SVN will be blocked from execution. The value will be restored to disable after the command is sent.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( AfterEoP _EQU_ 0x1 ) _AND_ Sif( AutoArbSvnCommit _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/Anti-Rollback SVN Configuration/Set HW-Enforced Anti-Rollback for Current SVN

knob.name: Asf
knob.description: Enable/Disable Alert Standard Format support.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF support

knob.name: UsbProvision
knob.description: Enable/Disable of AMT USB Provisioning.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/USB Provisioning of AMT

knob.name: AmtCiraRequest
knob.description: Trigger CIRA boot Note: Network Access must be activated first from MEBx Setup.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/CIRA Configuration/Activate Remote Assistance Process

knob.name: AmtCiraTimeout
knob.description: OEM defined timeout for MPS connection to be established. 0 - use the default timeout value of 60 seconds. 255 - MEBx waits until the connection succeeds
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( AmtCiraRequest _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/CIRA Configuration/CIRA Timeout

knob.name: FwProgress
knob.description: Enable/Disable PET Events Progress to receive PET Events.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF Configuration/PET Progress

knob.name: WatchDog
knob.description: Enable/Disable WatchDog Timer.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF Configuration/WatchDog

knob.name: WatchDogTimerOs
knob.description: Set OS watchdog timer.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( WatchDog _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF Configuration/OS Timer

knob.name: WatchDogTimerBios
knob.description: Set BIOS watchdog timer.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( WatchDog _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF Configuration/BIOS Timer

knob.name: AsfSensorsTable
knob.description: Adds ASF Sensor Table into ASF! ACPI Table
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/ASF Configuration/ASF Sensors Table

knob.name: SecureEraseModeRealMode
knob.description: Change Secure Erase module behavior: Simulated: Performs SE flow without erasing SSD Real: Erase SSD.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/Secure Erase Configuration/Secure Erase mode

knob.name: ForceSecureErase
knob.description: Force Secure Erase on next boot
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Asf _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/Secure Erase Configuration/Force Secure Erase

knob.name: AmtbxHotKeyPressed
knob.description: OEMFLag Bit 1: Enable automatic MEBx hotkey press.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/OEM Flags Settings/MEBx hotkey Pressed

knob.name: AmtbxSelectionScreen
knob.description: OEMFLag Bit 2: Enable MEBx selection screen with 2 options: Press 1 to enter ME Configuration Screens Press 2 to initiate a remote connection Note: Network Access must be activated from MEBx Setup for this screen to be displayed.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/OEM Flags Settings/MEBx Selection Screen

knob.name: HideUnConfigureMeConfirm
knob.description: OEMFlag Bit 6: Hide Unconfigure ME confirmation prompt when attempting ME unconfiguration.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/OEM Flags Settings/Hide Unconfigure ME Confirmation Prompt

knob.name: MebxDebugMsg
knob.description: OEMFlag Bit 14: Enable OEM debug menu in MEBx.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/OEM Flags Settings/MEBx OEM Debug Menu Enable

knob.name: UnConfigureMe
knob.description: OEMFlag Bit 15: Unconfigure ME with resetting MEBx password to default.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/OEM Flags Settings/Unconfigure ME

knob.name: MebxNonUiTextMode
knob.description: Resolution for non-UI text mode.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/MEBx Resolution Settings/Non-UI Mode Resolution

knob.name: MebxUiTextMode
knob.description: Resolution for UI text mode.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/MEBx Resolution Settings/UI Mode Resolution

knob.name: MebxGraphicsMode
knob.description: Resolution for graphics mode.
knob.depex: Sif( MeStateControl _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MeImageType _NEQ_ 0x04 OR MeFirmwareInfo _NEQ_ 0x00 ) _AND_ Gif( RemoteSessionActive _EQU_ 0x1 OR AmtGlobalState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( MngState _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Amt _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/PCH-FW Configuration/AMT Configuration/MEBx Resolution Settings/Graphics Mode Resolution

knob.name: EnableDigitalThermalSensor
knob.description: Disabled: ACPI thermal management uses EC reported temperature values. Enabled: ACPI thermal management uses DTS SMM mechanism to obtain CPU temperature values. Out of Spec: ACPI Thermal Management uses EC reported temperature values and DTS SMM is used to handle Out of Spec condition.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/DTS SMM

knob.name: TCCActivationOffset
knob.description: Offset from factory set Tcc activation temprature at which the Thermal Control Circuit must be activated. Tcc will be activated at: Tcc Activation Temp - Tcc Activation Offset. Tcc Activation Offset range is 0 to 63.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Tcc Activation Offset

knob.name: TccOffsetTimeWindow
knob.description: Tcc Offset Time Window for Running Average Temperature Limit(RATL) feature. The Tcc offset time window can range from 5ms to 448s
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Tcc Offset Time Window

knob.name: TccOffsetClamp
knob.description: Tcc Offset Clamp bit Enable for Running Average Temperature Limit(RATL) feature to allow CPU to throttle below P1.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Tcc Offset Clamp Enable

knob.name: TccOffsetLock
knob.description: Lock Enable for Running Average Temperature Limit(RATL) feature to lock Temperature Target MSR.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Tcc Offset Lock Enable

knob.name: EnableProcHot
knob.description: When a processor thermal sensor trips (either core), the PROCHOT# will be driven. If bi-direction is enabled, external agents can drive PROCHOT# to throttle the processor.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Bi-directional PROCHOT#

knob.name: DisableProcHotOut
knob.description: Enable/Disable PROCHOT# Output
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Disable PROCHOT# Output

knob.name: DisableVrThermalAlert
knob.description: Enable/Disable VR Thermal Alert
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/Disable VR Thermal Alert

knob.name: ProcHotResponse
knob.description: Enable/Disable PROCHOT Response
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/PROCHOT Response

knob.name: ProcHotLock
knob.description: Enable/Disable PROCHOT Lock
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/PROCHOT Lock

knob.name: TStatesEnable
knob.description: Enable/Disable ACPI T-States.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/ACPI T-States

knob.name: PeciSxReset
knob.description: Enable/Disable PECI Reset during Sx. Enabling will trigger a PECI Reset during boot to resolve rare Sx PECI issue. Via pcode mailbox command 0x36. Default is disabled.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/PECI Reset

knob.name: PeciC10Reset
knob.description: Enable/Disable PECI C10 Reset command. Enables a mailbox command to resolve rare PECI related C10 issues. Via pcode mailbox command 0x24. Default is disabled/ no command sent.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/CPU Thermal Configuration/PECI C10 Reset

knob.name: AutoThermalReporting
knob.description: Configure _CRT, _PSV and _AC0 automatically based on values recommended in BWG?s Thermal Reporting for Thermal Management settings. Set to Disabled for manual configuration.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Automatic Thermal Reporting

knob.name: CriticalThermalTripPoint
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Critical Trip Point - the point in which the OS will shut the system off. NOTE: 119C is the Plan Of Record (POR) for all Intel mobile processors.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Critical Trip Point

knob.name: Ac0TripPoint
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Active Trip Point 0 - the point in which the OS will turn the processor fan on Active Trip Point 0 Fan Speed.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Active Trip Point 0

knob.name: Ac0FanSpeed
knob.description: Active Trip Point 0 Fan Speed in percentage. Value must be between 0 (Fan off) - 100 (Max fan speed). This is the speed at which fan will run when Active Trip Point 0 is crossed.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Active Trip Point 0 Fan Speed

knob.name: Ac1TripPoint
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Active Trip Point 1 - the point in which the OS will turn the processor fan on Active Trip Point 1 Fan Speed.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Active Trip Point 1

knob.name: Ac1FanSpeed
knob.description: Active Trip Point 1 Fan Speed in percentage. Value must be between 0 (Fan off) - 100 (Max fan speed). This value must be less than Active Trip Point 0 Fan speed. This is the speed at which fan will run when Active Trip 1 is crossed.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Active Trip Point 1 Fan Speed

knob.name: PassiveThermalTripPoint
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Passive Trip Point - the point in which the OS will begin throttling the processor.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Passive Trip Point

knob.name: PassiveTc1Value
knob.description: This value sets the TC1 value for the ACPI Passive Cooling Formula. Range 1 - 16
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/ Passive TC1 Value

knob.name: PassiveTc2Value
knob.description: This value sets the TC2 value for the ACPI Passive Cooling Formula. Range 1 - 16
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/ Passive TC2 Value

knob.name: PassiveTspValue
knob.description: This item sets the TSP value for the ACPI Passive Cooling Formula. It represents in tenths of a second how often the OS will read the temperature when passive cooling is enabled. Range 2 - 32
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/ Passive TSP Value

knob.name: DisableActiveTripPoints
knob.description: Disable Active Trip Points
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Active Trip Points

knob.name: DisablePassiveTripPoints
knob.description: Disable Passive Trip Points
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Passive Trip Points

knob.name: DisableCriticalTripPoints
knob.description: Disable Critical Trip Points
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Critical Trip Points

knob.name: PCHTempReadEnable
knob.description: PCH Temperature Read Enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/PCH Temp Read

knob.name: CPUEnergyReadEnable
knob.description: CPU Energy Read Enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/CPU Energy Read

knob.name: CPUTempReadEnable
knob.description: CPU Temperature Read Enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/CPU Temp Read

knob.name: AlertEnableLock
knob.description: Lock all Alert Enable settings
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/Alert Enable Lock

knob.name: PchAlert
knob.description: PCH Alert pin enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/ PCH Alert

knob.name: DimmAlert
knob.description: DIMM Alert pin enable
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/ DIMM Alert

knob.name: CpuTemp
knob.description: Help on CPU Temperature
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/CPU Temp

knob.name: CpuFanSpeed
knob.description: Fan speed that EC will use if OS is hung
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/Platform Thermal Configuration/CPU Fan Speed

knob.name: EnableDptf
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel Dynamic Platform Thermal Framework
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/DPTF

knob.name: EnableSaDevice
knob.description: Enable/Disable Processor Thermal Device.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/Processor Thermal Device

knob.name: ActiveThermalTripPointSA
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Active Thermal Trip Point. NOTE: a value of zero will cause the DPTF driver to disable the trip point.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Active Thermal Trip Point

knob.name: PassiveThermalTripPointSA
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Passive Thermal Trip Point. NOTE: a value of zero will cause the DPTF driver to disable the trip point.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Passive Thermal Trip Point

knob.name: CriticalThermalTripPointSA
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Critical Thermal Trip Point. NOTE: a value of zero will cause the DPTF driver to disable the trip point.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Critical Thermal Trip Point

knob.name: CriticalThermalTripPointSaS3
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Critical Thermal Trip Point for entering S3 or CS. NOTE: a value of zero will cause the DPTF driver to disable the trip point.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ S3/CS Thermal Trip Point

knob.name: HotThermalTripPointSA
knob.description: This value controls the temperature of the ACPI Hot Thermal Trip Point. NOTE: a value of zero will cause the DPTF driver to disable the trip point.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Hot Thermal Trip Point

knob.name: ThermalSamplingPeriodSA
knob.description: The polling interval in 10ths of seconds. A value of 0 tells the driver to use interrupts. NOTE: The granularity of the sampling period is 0.1 seconds. For example, if the sampling period is 30 seconds, then _TSP needs to report 300; if the sampling period is 0.5 seconds, then choose 5.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Thermal Sampling Period

knob.name: PpccStepSize
knob.description: Step size for Turbo power limit (RAPL) control
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ PPCC Step Size

knob.name: MinPowerLimit0
knob.description: This value provides the minimum power limit in the PPCC object for this platform at cTDP Level 0 (Nominal). Enter the value in milliwatts with 125mw granularity.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Minimum Power Limit (cTDP Nom)

knob.name: MinPowerLimit1
knob.description: This value provides the minimum power limit in the PPCC object for this platform cTDP Level 1 (Down). Enter the value in milliwatts with 125mw granularity.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Minimum Power Limit (cTDP Down)

knob.name: MinPowerLimit2
knob.description: This value provides the minimum power limit in the PPCC object for this platform cTDP Level 2 (Up). Enter the value in milliwatts with 125mw granularity.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ Minimum Power Limit (cTDP up)

knob.name: LPOEnable
knob.description: Instructs the policy to use Active Cores if they are available.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ CLPO Enable

knob.name: LPOStartPState
knob.description: Instructs the policy when to initiate Active Core control if enabled. Note: 16-LFM
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ CLPO Start PState

knob.name: LPOStepSize
knob.description: Instructs the policy to take away logical processors in the specified percentage steps.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ CLPO Step Size

knob.name: LPOPowerControlSetting
knob.description: Instructs the policy whether to use Core offlining or SMT offlining if Active core control is enabled to be used in P0 or when power control is applied.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ CLPO Power Control

knob.name: LPOPerformanceControlSetting
knob.description: Instructs the policy whether to use Core offlining or SMT offlining if Active core control is enabled to be used in P1 or when performance control is applied.
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ CLPO Performance Control

knob.name: EnableCtdpPolicy
knob.description: Enable/Disable Intel Configurable TDP
knob.depex: Sif( PlatformFlavor _EQU_ 0x2 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableDptf _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( EnableSaDevice _EQU_ 0 OR ConfigTdpAvailable _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/ ConfigTDP

knob.name: EnableDCFG
knob.description: An Integer containing the DPTF Configuration bitmap: BIT0[Generic UI Access Control](0-enable,1-disable) BIT1[Restricted UI Access Control](0-enable,1-disable) BIT2[shell Access Control](0-enable,1-disable) BIT3[Environment Monitoring Report Control](0-report,1-silent) BIT4[Thermal Mitigation Report Control](0-silent,1-report) BIT5[Thermal Policy Report Control](0-silent,1-report)
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/DPTF Configuration

knob.name: EnableFan1Device
knob.description: Enable the Fan1 device.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thermal Configuration/DPTF Configuration/FAN1 Device

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Platform Settings/Enable xdpclock

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Platform Settings/Enable EPI Device

knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Platform Settings/Enable PowerMeter

For SawtoothPeak USB Port1(Below) is Superspeed and Port2(Top) is HighSpeed. Check respective board configuration to know about USB port position.

knob.name: UsbMainSupport
knob.description: USB Support Parameters
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/USB Support

knob.name: UsbLegacySupport
knob.description: Enables Legacy USB support. AUTO option disables legacy support if no USB devices are connected. DISABLE option will keep USB devices available only for EFI applications.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/Legacy USB Support

knob.name: UsbOddLegacyBootSupport
knob.description: This W/A for SMM protection, BIOS need to pre-allocate memory for Usb ODD boot, but it will break memory continuity under 640KB, big option rom can?t install, so default disable to keep memory continuity under 640KB,
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/USB ODD Legacy Boot Support

knob.name: UsbXhciSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable XHCI Controller Legacy support.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 OR XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/XHCI Legacy Support

knob.name: UsbXhciHandoff
knob.description: This is a workaround for OSes without XHCI hand-off support. The XHCI ownership change should be claimed by XHCI driver.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 OR XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/XHCI Hand-off

knob.name: UsbEhciHandoff
knob.description: This is a workaround for OSes without EHCI hand-off support. The EHCI ownership change should be claimed by EHCI driver.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 OR EhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/EHCI Hand-off

knob.name: UsbMassDriverSupport
knob.description: Enable/Disable USB Mass Storage Driver Support.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( UhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND OhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND EhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/USB Mass Storage Driver Support

knob.name: UsbControlTimeOut
knob.description: The time-out value for Control, Bulk, and Interrupt transfers.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( UhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND OhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND EhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/USB transfer time-out

knob.name: UsbMassResetDelay
knob.description: USB mass storage device Start Unit command time-out.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( UhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND OhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND EhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/Device reset time-out

knob.name: PowerGoodDeviceDelay
knob.description: Maximum time the device will take before it properly reports itself to the Host Controller. ?Auto? uses default value: for a Root port it is 100 ms, for a Hub port the delay is taken from Hub descriptor.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( UhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND OhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND EhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/Device power-up delay

knob.name: PowerGoodDeviceNumDelay
knob.description: Delay range is 1..40 seconds, in one second increments
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( PowerGoodDeviceDelay _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR ( UhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND OhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND EhciNum _EQU_ 0 AND XhciNum _EQU_ 0 ) )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/Device power-up delay in seconds

knob.name: UsbEmu1
knob.description: Mass storage device emulation type. ?AUTO? enumerates devices according to their media format. Optical drives are emulated as ?CDROM?, drives with no media will be emulated according to a drive type.
knob.depex: Dif( CsmControl _EQU_ 1 OR CsmControl _EQU_ 2 ) _AND_ Sif( UsbMainSupport _EQU_ 0 OR UsbEmu1Valid _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( Access _EQU_ 1 OR UsbLegacySupport _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/LEGACY USB Configuration/N/A

knob.name: DiscreteTbtSupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable Discrete Thunderbolt(TM) Support.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Discrete Thunderbolt(TM) Support

knob.name: TbtVtdBaseSecurity
knob.description: Enable Native OS security solution for Thunderbolt hosts
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Native OS security for TBT

knob.name: ControlIommu
knob.description: Enable dTBT and PCH USB topology IOMMU in Pre-boot environment (If DMAR table is installed in DXE and If VTD_INFO_PPI is installed in PEI.) TBT tree won?t be included in the exception list.
knob.depex: Sif( TbtSetupFormSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DiscreteTbtSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( TbtVtdBaseSecurity _EQU_ 0 OR GrayOutControlIommu _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Control Iommu Pre-boot Behavior

option.text: Enable IOMMU during boot without exception list
Enable IOMMU during boot with exception list

knob.name: TbtBootOn
knob.description: Enabled allows boot from Bootable devices which is present behind Thunderbolt
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Thunderbolt Boot Support

knob.name: TrOsup
knob.description: Enable or Disable Titan Ridge Workaround for OSUP
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Titan Ridge Workaround for OSUP

knob.name: TbtAcDcSwitch
knob.description: Enable or Disable Tbt Dynamic AC/DC L1 Support
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Tbt Dynamic AC/DC L1

knob.name: TbtWakeupSupport
knob.description: Enable or disable system wake from Thunderbolt(TM) devices.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Wake From Thunderbolt(TM) Devices

knob.name: TbtSkipPciOprom
knob.description: Enable or Disable PCI OptionRom loading for Thunderbolt(TM) devices
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Skip PCI OptionRom

knob.name: TbtAcpiRemovalSupport
knob.description: Enable or Disable ACPI method _RMV support for Thunderbolt(TM) devices
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/ACPI Removal Object Suppport

knob.name: SecurityMode
knob.description: Security level selection.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Security Level

knob.name: TBTHotSMI
knob.description: When enabled, BIOS generates software SMI to assign resource to TBT devices
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/ SW SMI on TBT hot-plug

knob.name: TBTHotNotify
knob.description: When enabled, BIOS generates ACPI Notify
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/ ACPI Notify on TBT Hot-plug

knob.name: TbtUsbOn
knob.description: Enabled allows boot from Usb devices which is present behind Thunderbolt
knob.depex: Sif( TbtSetupFormSupport _NEQ_ 1 ) _AND_ Sif( DiscreteTbtSupport _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( DiscreteTbtSupport _EQU_ 0 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Discrete Thunderbolt(TM) Configuration/Thunderbolt Usb Support
