knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ICC/OC Watchdog Timer

knob.name: Profile
knob.description: Select clock profile that corresponds to the platform configuration. Profiles are defined by the OEM and platform capabilites. Tpically, profile 0 has failsafe settings. Other profiles correspond to WiMax, 3G, or Overclocking settings.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ICC Profile

knob.name: IccPllShutdownEnabled
knob.description: This option controls the programming of the ICC PLL shutdown flow. When enabled, this ICC PM register will be programmed on every non-Sx boot.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ICC PLL Shutdown

knob.name: Frequency
knob.description: Frequency in 10kHz increments. Specifies new BCLK frequency to be applied. Frequency is rounded to nearest valid value. Allowed range is limited by the Max/Min supported frequencies. Changes are not applied until settings are saved and platform resets. Example: For 125.70MHz, enter 12570.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ Clock Frequency

knob.name: BclkChangeWarmReset
knob.description: Changes how the BCLK frequency changes are applied permanent with warm reset. 0 - Disabled. 1 - Enabled.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ Bclk Change Permanent

knob.name: BclkChangeContinues
knob.description: Changes how the BCLK frequency changes are applied. 0 - Realtime. 1 - Permanent, without warm reset. NOTE: Realtime changes will be applied when ?F4? hotkey is pressed. Uses MEI SET_CLOCK_SETTINGS command 0x1B.
knob.depex: Sif( AllowAdvancedOptions _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Gif( ShowFrequency _EQU_ 0 ) _AND_ Sif( BclkChangeWarmReset _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ Bclk Change w/o Reset

knob.name: Spread
knob.description: Specifies the amount of spread spectrum clocking to be applied to the base clock frequency in 0.01% increments. Allowed range is limited by Maximum Spread % and supported Spread mode Adjustements. If Changes Allowed, a value between 0 and Max Spread % can be specified. Value is adjusted to settings supported by HW. If only Halt Allowed, only 0% and default spread % can be specified. Changes are not applied until settings are saved and platform resets.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Intel ICC/ Spread %

knob.name: BoardReworkComplainceEnable
knob.description: To Enable/ Disable Board Rework Complaince Suppport.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Intel Advanced Menu/Rework Configuration/Board Rework Compliance

knob.name: CsmControl
knob.description: Detect Legacy VGA will enable CSM if Gfx device only implements legacy VBIOS (not UEFI GOP), otherwise CSM will be disabled.
knob.depex: Gif( TbtVtdBaseSecurityGrayOut _EQU_ 1 ) _AND_ Gif( LowPowerS0Idle _EQU_ 1 OR SecureBoot _EQU_ 1 )
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/CSM Control

knob.name: DisplayBootMode
knob.description: Select display boot mode.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/Display Boot Mode

knob.name: FastBoot
knob.description: Enables/Disables boot with initialization of a minimal set of devices required to launch active boot option. Has no effect for BBS boot options.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/Fast Boot

knob.name: FastBootWdt
knob.description: Enables/Disables Fast Boot WDT (Watch Dog Timer).
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/ Fast Boot WDT

knob.name: SkipHIIUpdate
knob.description: If Enabled, skip updating HII database strings in setup menu
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/ Skip Setup HII Update

knob.name: ConInBehavior
knob.description: Select how to enumerate console inputs. - Windows Console: No input consoles will be enumerated. - PS/2 Console: BIOS will check if PS/2 keyboard is connected or not. If connected, BIOS will only connect to PS/2 keyboard else BIOS will enumerate USB keyboard. - Reconnect Last Good Input Consoles: Enumerate all Console input devices that were enumerated in previous FULL boot.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/ Console Input Behavior

knob.name: LazyConIn
knob.description: Enable Lazy ConIn
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/Enable Lazy ConIn

knob.name: VirtualKeyboard
knob.description: Enables/Disables Virtual Keyboard in BIOS
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/Enable Virtual Keyboard

knob.name: BootFirstToShell
knob.prompt: Enforce Shell as the first boot
knob.description: Enforce Shell as the first boot option.
knob.SetupPgPtr: Boot Configuration Menu/Enforce Shell as the first boot

knob.name: AttemptSecureBoot
knob.description: Enable or Disable the Secure Boot feature after platform reset

knob.name: BootOrder_0
knob.description: Boot Order Index 0

knob.name: BootOrder_1
knob.description: Boot Order Index 1

knob.name: BootOrder_2
knob.description: Boot Order Index 2

knob.name: BootOrder_3
knob.description: Boot Order Index 3

knob.name: BootOrder_4
knob.description: Boot Order Index 4

knob.name: BootOrder_5
knob.description: Boot Order Index 5
